doc.previous: Android is a Linux distribution according to the Linux Foundation 124 Google s open source chief Chris DiBona 125 and several journalists 126 127 Others such as Google engineer Patrick Brady say that Android is not Linux in the traditional Unix like Linux distribution sense Android does not include the GNU C Library it uses Bionic as an alternative C library and some of other components typically found in Linux distributions 128
doc.after: On top of the Linux kernel there are the middleware libraries and APIs written in C and application software running on an application framework which includes Java compatible libraries based on Apache Harmony Development of the Linux kernel continues independently of other Android s source code bases
